alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wakulla, Gadsden, western Jefferson and Leon Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles west of Crawfordville to 8 miles east of Woodville. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Gretna, Lake Bradford, Alma, Cody, Wakulla Springs, Florence, Quincy Airport and Tallahassee Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
